description: This soup is quite aromatic and smooth with a light spice.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato & Coconut Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g sweet potato, washed, peeled and chopped into small cubes
2 medium white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pot to a medium heat with the canola oil and fry the cubed potatoes with the onion, garlic and ginger for 6 minutes while tossing.
Add the rest of the ingredients apart from the chives and allow the mixture to simmer for 15 minutes while stirring occasionally.
Remove the soup from the heat and blend using a hand blender.
